remarks.para: May be inoperative provided system is deactivated, and AOM performance decrements are applied if landing performance requires use of auto speed brakes.

numlitem.para: The AOM provides performance penalties for aircraft certified with landing field length credit for auto speed brakes.
For landing, deploy speed brakes manually.

note.para: Do not arm Spoilers for landing.

numlitem.para: Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.

note.para: The EICAS message will be present any time the Spoiler light is illuminated.

numlitem.para: Downgrade aircraft dispatch category status to CAT 3a.
Landing Weight Reduction - see the destination airport landing chart for Max Landing Weight with Manual Spoilers.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.

placard.para: Placard AUTO SPD BRK light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
Placard near speed brake handle on pilot’s control stand "AUTO SPEED BRAKE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

numlitem.para: Open and collar AUTO SPEEDBRK circuit breaker (11G11).
AUTO SPD BRK light on overhead panel will illuminate – place tape over the light or remove the bulb.

note.para: The EICAS message will be present any time the Spoiler light is illuminated.

numlitem.para: Notify Flight Dispatch. Allowable landing weight may be reduced.
